itunes:title: Episode 633 - Kanye West For President
title: Episode 633 - Kanye West For President
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss the breaking news of Kanye West announcing his campaign for the 2020 Presidential race, colleges are shutting down for the Fall semester and Ross is having major doubts there will be any collegiate sports, Charlie ...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway discuss the breaking news of Kanye West announcing his campaign for the 2020 Presidential race, colleges are shutting down for the Fall semester and Ross is having major doubts there will be any collegiate sports, Charlie Daniels’ passing due to a severe stroke, President Trump lights Bubba Wallace up on Twitter, and the two rank the best and worst replacement names for the Washington Redskins. Go Hogs!
